name: Snakes that Slither
description:
This is the Snakes that Slither game, and I really worked hard on the game. Here are the rules:

1. WASD to move blue.

2. IJKL to move red (IN 2 PLAYER ONLY).

3. Try to survive without touching any of the lines, and use teamwork.

4. Many people have been confused by this so I will say this again. DO NOT GO THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION OF THE DIRECTION YOU WERE JUST GOING OR THE GAME WILL RESTART.

5. If you touch your line (or the other players lines in two player), the game will then automatically restart, so good luck!
